00045 static bool runOnce = true;

00047 /**************************************************************************/
00050 void TFT_DirectGPIOConfig(void)
00051 {
00052   /* EBI TFT DCLK/Dot Clock */
00053   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 8, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00054   /* EBI TFT DATAEN */
00055   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 9, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00056   /* EBI TFT VSYNC  */
00057   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 10, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00058   /* EBI TFT HSYNC */
00059   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 11, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00060 }
00061

00063 /**************************************************************************/
00072 bool TFT_DirectInit(const EBI_TFTInit_TypeDef *tftInit)
00073 {
00074   bool     ret;
00075   uint32_t i, freq;
00076   EMSTATUS stat;
00077 
00078   /* If we are in BC_UIF_AEM_EFM state, we can redraw graphics */
00079   if (BSP_RegisterRead(&BC_REGISTER->UIF_AEM) == BC_UIF_AEM_EFM)
00080   {
00081     /* If we're not BC_ARB_CTRL_EBI state, we need to reconfigure display controller */
00082     if ((BSP_RegisterRead(&BC_REGISTER->ARB_CTRL) != BC_ARB_CTRL_EBI) || runOnce)
00083     {
00084       /* Enable SSD2119 Serial Port Interface */
00085       BSP_PeripheralAccess(BSP_TFT, true);
00086 
00087       /* Enable EBI mode of operation on SSD2119 controller */
00088       BSP_DisplayControl(BSP_Display_EBI);
00089       BSP_DisplayControl(BSP_Display_ResetAssert);
00090       BSP_DisplayControl(BSP_Display_PowerDisable);
00091       freq = SystemCoreClockGet();
00092       for (i = 0; i < (freq / 100); i++)
00093       {
00094         __NOP();
00095       }
00096       /* Configure display for Direct Drive "Mode Generic" + 3-wire SPI mode */
00097       BSP_DisplayControl(BSP_Display_ModeGeneric);
00098       BSP_DisplayControl(BSP_Display_PowerEnable);
00099       BSP_DisplayControl(BSP_Display_ResetRelease);
00100 
00101       /* Configure GPIO for EBI and TFT */
00102       TFT_DirectGPIOConfig();
00103 
00104       /* Initialize display */
00105       stat = DMD_init(0);
00106       if (DMD_OK == stat) stat = DMD_selectFramebuffer((void*)EBI_BankAddress(EBI_BANK2));
00107       if (DMD_OK != stat) while (1) ;
00108 
00109       /* Configure EBI TFT direct drive */
00110       EBI_TFTInit(tftInit);
00111 
00112       runOnce = false;
00113     }
00114     ret = true;
00115   }
00116   else
00117   {
00118     ret = false;
00119   }
00120 
00121   return ret;
00122 }
